title: New: Girls – Vomit
body:
The new [Girls](http://pitchfork.com/artists/1826-girls/) album _[Father, Son, Holy Ghost](http://pitchfork.com/news/43107-girls-announce-new-album/)_ is due to be released on September 12 in Europe. The first track from the LP, Vomit, was premiered on KEXP in Seattle this morning.

Stream the track below.

 [Girls – Vomit](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad/girls-vomit) by [crackintheroad](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad)

excerpt.full: The new Girls album Father, Son, Holy Ghost is due to be released on September 12 in Europe. The first track from the LP, Vomit, was premiered on KEXP in Seattle this morning. Stream the track below. Girls – Vomit by crackintheroad
